Congratulations to our own Mr. Ned Panfile - who was selected this year as an honoree for the Spirit of Somerset Awards held in Somerville on September 20, 2016.

Mr. Panfile was celebrated for his contributions to Somerset County in the category of athletics and recreation, having served as both football coach and volunteer coach in Manville for more than 50 years. Mr. Panfile began his coaching career at Manville High School in the late 1950’s and throughout the 1960’s. He went on to make significant contributions to the sport of Football as the Head Football Coach at Princeton University. Mr. Panfile dedicated his career to the students of Manville, serving as the Vice Principal of Manville High School for 42 years. Mr. Panfile is currently a member of the Manville Board of Education.

Pictured below:

(Left) Mr. Ned Panfile accepts his Spirit of Somerset Award on September 20, 2016 in Somerville. (Right) Ned and Barbara Panfile pose for photos following the 2016 Spirit of Somerset Awards Ceremony.

It has come to our attention that some of our students and parents have been experiencing difficulty with the IXL website due to some recent internal changes made by the IXL Company.

1. Go to the “Search Bar” found at the top of the IXL Screen.

3. The key words should lead students to the appropriate lesson at grade level.

Thank you,

Anne Facendo
